name: Street Hawk: Catalogue Edition
overview: Not to be confused with the 1986 release of the same name, also unleashed by Ocean Software, this 1985 game was a limited release that was rushed out to fulfill an order for Kay's Catalogue in the UK. Also given away free to some subscribers of Crash magazine. The game itself is a simplistic shooter that appears to bear very little to do with the TV show it's based on.
